mapper.insert: MERGE INTO restaurant r USING dual ON (r.rst_id = '${rst_id}') WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET rst_name = '${rst_name}', rst_addr1 = '${rst_addr1}', rst_addr2 = '${rst_addr2}', rst_phone = '${rst_phone}', rst_cate = '${rst_cate}' WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (rst_id, rst_name, rst_addr1, rst_addr2, rst_phone, rst_cate) VALUES ('${rst_id}', '${rst_name}', '${rst_addr1}', '${rst_addr2}', '${rst_phone}', '${rst_cate}')
mapper.select: select rst_id, count(*) as likes_total from likes where rst_id = #{rst_id} group by rst_id
